name: TRAWL (itch) (Greeble)
description:
TRAWL is a fast paced first person shooter set in a sci-fi dystopian city that is run by a powerful ecclesiarchy that runs the entire city. You play as the Captain, a daredevil psychopath that lives for the thrill of the kill and the need for speed. As the Captain you want to clear the levels as fast as you can and with as much lethality as you can. Points and score is awarded for completing levels fast and with a higher body count comes a higher score and rating. So grab some guns, put on your sneakers and jump into the chaotic city found in TRAWL.

Greeble Team:
Dunstan Dalin - Programmer
Ashley Rickett - Programmer
Leroy Moore - Artist
Toby McLatchie - Artist
Fraser Craill - Artist
Paige Williams - Artist
Joshua Strother - Artist
